title: Rainy night driving in a city street with moderate traffic.
caption: A blue car drives slowly on a rainy night in a city street with moderate traffic.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.1 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The blue car is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city street with moderate traffic. There are other cars on the road, some of them are driving faster than the blue car. The road is wet and there are street lights and traffic lights along the street. The weather is rainy and the visibility is moderate. The blue car is almost stopped and there are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
reasoning: The blue car is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city street with moderate traffic. The driver is being cautious due to the rainy weather and the presence of other vehicles on the road. The driver is maintaining a safe distance from the car in front and is prepared to brake or change lanes if necessary. The driver is also paying attention to the traffic lights and stop signs along the street to ensure safe navigation through the city.
